attributes.action: Immediately ban Love Island from TV.
attributes.background: Love Island is a TV show that objectifies and degrades women. I find it extremely offensive that these "perfect" people are allowed to be put on TV to sexually entertain each other. - This is on 5 nights a week from just 9pm. It is sending out an awful message to young people and needs attention!

rejection.details:
Ofcom are responsible for regulating most TV content. You can find out how to complain about a programme to Ofcom here:
https://www.ofcom.org.uk/tv-radio-and-on-demand/how-to-report-a-complaint
